name: py-python-magic

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A python wrapper for libmagic. This project is named python-magic but
imports as the module name "magic".

dependencies.name: file
dependencies.description:
The file command is "a file type guesser", that is, a command-line tool
that tells you in words what kind of data a file contains

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-beancount
dependent_to.description:
A double-entry bookkeeping computer language that lets you define
financial transaction records in a text file, read them in memory,
generate a variety of reports from them, and provides a web interface..

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: py-s3cmd
dependent_to.description:
S3cmd (s3cmd) is a free command line tool and client for uploading,
retrieving and managing data in Amazon S3 and other cloud storage
service providers that use the S3 protocol, such as Google Cloud Storage
or DreamHost DreamObjects. It is best suited for power users who are
familiar with command line programs.
